content:
Craft an item of type: stripped_jungle_wood
inventory=[{"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 5, "index": 10}, {"type": "wandering_trader_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 27}, {"type": "diamond_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "slime_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft stripped_jungle_wood, I need to place 4 stripped_jungle_logs in a 2x2 formation on the crafting table. The first stripped_jungle_log will be placed in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stripped_jungle_wood
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 5, "index": 10}, {"type": "wandering_trader_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 3, "index": 27}, {"type": "diamond_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "slime_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}]
thought: The second stripped_jungle_log will be placed in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stripped_jungle_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 5, "index": 10}, {"type": "wandering_trader_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "diamond_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "slime_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}]
thought: The third stripped_jungle_log will be placed in slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stripped_jungle_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 5, "index": 10}, {"type": "wandering_trader_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "diamond_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "slime_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}]
thought: The fourth stripped_jungle_log will be placed in slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stripped_jungle_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 5, "index": 10}, {"type": "wandering_trader_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "slime_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}]
thought: Now I can craft the stripped_jungle_wood by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
